channel.title: Magic Haxx : 317 server and client development team-Pictures cooming soon-
channel.description:
-wait to approve this,still editing this topic- [b][u][size=28pt]Magic Haxx[/size][/u][/b]
[b][size=16pt]Created by mich702703 - known as Devius[/size][/b] [u][b]
What is Magic Haxx and what is Magic Haxx gonna do?[/b][/u]
Magic Haxx is a just started development team that will try to create one of the best RSPS there is, to creat a SUPER client for our server. (HD and 317) There is currently no progress because i am waiting for people to join the team (and i dont wanne screw it up because my team has something to say 2) Requirements below.
[u][b]How can we update the server and the client because we live in different countries?[/b][/u]
Ok i am from belgium(just to let u know).
We are gonna update our client and server in a (tortoisse-)SVN trunk on Google Code. This will be on a separated trunk.One for the client and one for the server.
-Picture comming soon to show the SVN Trunk- [u][b] The Client Base -i made a v1-[/b][/u]
-Pictures coming soon-
[u][b]The Server -delta source-[/b][/u]
-Pictures comming soon because there is no server development atm-
[u][b]Overvieuw[size=6pt]-what do we wanne develop-[/size][/b][/u]
[ul][li]Creating a 317 client and server (HD later)-suggestions when team is ready[/li] [li]Setting up a website and forum-suggestions when team is ready[/li][/ul]
[u][b]How to join[/b][/u] -comming soon-

[u][b]

What is Magic Haxx and what is Magic Haxx gonna do?[/b][/u]

Magic Haxx is a just started development team that will try to create one of the best RSPS there is, to creat a SUPER client for our server. (HD and 317)
There is currently no progress because i am waiting for people to join the team (and i dont wanne screw it up because my team has something to say 2)

This will be on a separated trunk.One for the client and one for the server.
